data.title: Aggressive TP Seize to Hookah
data.description: Here's a simple, but effective Seize lineup to fight Attackers taking Hookah. It is recommended to coordinate utility with your teammates to ensure a successful crunch.

data.title: A Site Retake Haunt + Prowler Combo
data.description: Combo your utility as shown in the video for a simple way to retake the A Site. Attackers scanned by the Haunt will be tracked down by your Prowlers.

data.title: Early Round Top B Long to B Fountain Haunt
data.description: Here's a Haunt lineup for B Fountain from Top B Long that has to be used at the very beginning of the round.

data.title: Early Round Hookah to Fountain Haunt
data.description: Here's an early round Haunt lineup for B Fountain from Hookah. You may want to wait a couple of seconds into the round to throw this Haunt, to lower the chances that players will be able to dodge it.
